name: omniscience
description: Watch for changes in arbitrary javascript data structures

scripts.build:umd: npm run build:commonjs && cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack lib/index.js dist/omniscience.js
scripts.build:umd:min: npm run build:commonjs && cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack lib/index.js dist/omniscience.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
